FetchError.Title: Error in getting IP info
FetchError.Message: There is an error in getting IP info

isEnabled.Title: Enable firewall
isEnabled.Extra: Enable kill switch functionality. You can also pause kill switch for for a specified time in main window.

openOnSystemStart.Title: Open on system start
openOnSystemStart.Extra: Enabling this option allows to activate the kill switch automatically when your computer is turned on.

runInMenubar.Title: Run in menubar
runInMenubar.Extra: Show application only in menubar Instead of displaying window. Your current IP is displayed on the menubar only when menubar is enabled.

allowPrivateIPs.Title: Allow private IP addresses
allowPrivateIPs.Extra: These addresses are commonly used for local area networks (LANs) in residential, office, and enterprise environments.

newIPNotification.Title: Notify on IP change
newIPNotification.Extra: Show a notification box when new IP address is detected.

enableAnalytics.Title: Share usage statistics
enableAnalytics.Extra: Allow this application to collect advanced analytics and crash reports to improve the application experience and stability.

storedItemsCount.Title: Maximum log items
storedItemsCount.Extra: Maximum items of connected IP addresses to save.

interval.Title: IP check interval
interval.Extra: The amount of time that it takes to get your IP address and lets you know if it changed.
